India has achieved a major milestone in the semiconductor space with the launch of the Vikram 32 chip, designed by ISRO and SCL. This breakthrough marks a huge step towards self-reliance in chip design and manufacturing, opening doors for applications in space, defense, electronics, and future commercial use. In this video, we explain what makes this development so important, how semiconductors act as the brain of modern technology, and what this could mean for India‚Äôs tech industry and stock market in the years ahead.

title: Mercedes GLE 450 | Gift | CA Rachana Ranade | #shorts  #dream
description:
We got this Mercedes GLE 450 as a gift.
Not from anyone else ‚Äî we gifted it to ourselves. üéÅ

15 years ago, owning this car was just a dream.
A dream that began when we owned a Maruti 800.
It felt big‚Ä¶ bold‚Ä¶ even laughable.

But we made a conscious decision:
We won‚Äôt buy a luxury car until our capital gains (profits) from few long term stocks could fully fund it.

So we spent a lot of time in researching.
We invested in good companies.
We stayed invested.
No panic. No shortcuts. Just patience and discipline.

Eventually, our dream turned into reality.

This car isn‚Äôt just a milestone.
It‚Äôs a proof that long-term investing works.
That when you give time to your money, your money gives back.

To anyone with a big dream ‚Äî
Do your research.
Stay focused.
Invest consistently.
And trust in the power of compounding. üí™‚ú®
